statements: SELECT * FROM AttendanceRecords WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT student_id, date FROM AttendanceRecords WHERE present = TRUE
SELECT date, student_id FROM AttendanceRecords WHERE date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT * FROM AttendanceRecords ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT student_id, present FROM AttendanceRecords WHERE student_id = 3 AND date > '2022-09-01'
SELECT * FROM AttendanceRecords WHERE student_id = 123 AND date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, date FROM AttendanceRecords WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT student_id, present FROM AttendanceRecords WHERE present = TRUE ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM AttendanceRecords;
SELECT student_id, count(*) AS total_records FROM AttendanceRecords GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, age FROM students;
SELECT student_name, class_grade FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT * FROM attendance_records ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT student_name, attendance_status FROM students INNER JOIN attendance_records ON students.student_id = attendance_records.student_id WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT age, gender, class_grade, student_name FROM students WHERE age > 18 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT student_name, gender, class_grade FROM students WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT student_id, student_name, class_grade FROM students WHERE age BETWEEN 15 AND 17 AND class_grade = '10th Grade' ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT student_name, date, attendance_status FROM students INNER JOIN attendance_records ON students.student_id = attendance_records.student_id WHERE attendance_status = 'Present' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students CROSS JOIN attendance_records WHERE students.student_id = attendance_records.student_id AND class_grade = '12th Grade';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Students ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, teacher_name FROM Courses WHERE teacher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_id, age FROM Students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT * FROM Attendance ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY last_name;
SELECT course_name, teacher_name FROM Courses WHERE course_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT s.first_name, c.course_name, a.attendance_date FROM Students s JOIN Attendance a ON s.student_id = a.student_id JOIN Courses c ON a.course_id = c.course_id;

SELECT s.first_name, s.last_name, c.course_name, a.attendance_date FROM Students s LEFT JOIN Attendance a ON s.student_id = a.student_id LEFT JOIN Courses c ON a.course_id = c.course_id WHERE a.attendance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Students WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM Students ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT class_name, teacher_name, session_time FROM Classes WHERE teacher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE is_present = TRUE ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM Students WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT class_name, teacher_name, session_time FROM Classes WHERE session_time >= '09:00:00';
SELECT teacher_name, subject_taught FROM Teachers WHERE subject_taught IN ('Math', 'Science');
SELECT student_id, class_id, attendance_date FROM Attendance WHERE is_present = TRUE ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM classes WHERE start_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT class_name, teacher_id FROM classes ORDER BY class_id DESC;
SELECT attendance_date, is_present FROM attendance WHERE student_id = 3 AND class_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE date_of_birth <= '2000-01-01';
SELECT student_name, contact_number FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM classes WHERE start_time >= '08:00:00' AND end_time <= '12:00:00';

SELECT student_name, class_name, attendance_date FROM students JOIN classes ON students.student_id = classes.teacher_id JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id WHERE attendance.is_present = true;
SELECT teacher_name, subject_taught FROM teachers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
